children.name: helloBack
children.text: Oh, hello! So you're a real estate agent?
children.response: I am. Would you like this house?

children.name: no
children.response: Can't afford it? Well, that's actually the good news. Because this house is free!

children.name: freeHow
children.response: Well, you got me. It's not "free." But it can be yours if you finish Part Two of the Main Quest. How's that sound?

children.name: soundsGood
children.text: Sounds awesome! I'll give it a shot

children.name: yes
children.response: Well, all you have to do is complete Part Two of the main quest. Then it's yours. Bon chance et bon courage!

entries.name: partTwoCompleted
entries.text: Congratulations on completing Part Two of Fantasy World Land.

children.name: thankYou
children.response: As promised, this house is now yours. You can store things here, sleep, eat, and invite friends over from time to time.

children.name: iWill
children.response: One more thing, from time to time there will be teleport pads to get you back here quickly. Unless you like walking miles and miles.

children.name: thankYou2
children.text: Thank you! That will help. Though, if you have any idea what I'm supposed to do next, that would help.
children.response: There should be some information about that in your Part Two Completed book, I believe. Good luck!
